metadata.title: CVE-2014-3999 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
The Horde_Ldap library before 2.0.6 for Horde allows remote attackers tobypass authentication by leveraging knowledge of the LDAP bind user DN.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-3999` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

php-horde-ldap - 2.0.6-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: php-horde-ldap package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.0.6-1').
